title: Awesome List Updates on May 01, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 01, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Flask
items.content_text:
### Utils / Testing

*   [Flask-Reactize (⭐8)](https://github.com/Azure-Samples/flask-reactize) - Hides the Node.js development backend for React behind a Flask application.
items.content_html:
Utils / Testing

  • Flask-Reactize (⭐8) - Hides the Node.js development backend for React behind a Flask application.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### [miniplug](https://sr.ht/~yerinalexey/miniplug)

*   No crashes or double plugin loading when re-sourcing `.zshrc`
*   Unlike other frameworks, Miniplug does not pollute your `$PATH`

### [zplug](https://github.com/zplug/zplug)

*   Unlike [antigen (⭐8.2k)](https://github.com/zsh-users/antigen), no ZSH plugin files (`*.plugin.zsh`) are required

### [zpm](https://github.com/zpm-zsh/zpm)

*   **zpm** runs on Linux, macOS, FreeBSD and Android.
*   **zpm** plugins are compatible with [oh-my-zsh](http://ohmyz.sh/).

### [zshing](https://github.com/zakariaGatter/zshing)

*   Keep track of and configure your plugins right in the `.zshrc`
*   Run the above actions in a *single command*
items.content_html:
miniplug

  • No crashes or double plugin loading when re-sourcing .zshrc
  • Unlike other frameworks, Miniplug does not pollute your $PATH

zplug

  • Unlike antigen (⭐8.2k), no ZSH plugin files (*.plugin.zsh) are required

zpm

  • zpm runs on Linux, macOS, FreeBSD and Android.
  • zpm plugins are compatible with oh-my-zsh.

zshing

  • Keep track of and configure your plugins right in the .zshrc
  • Run the above actions in a single command

items.title: Awesome Fastapi
items.content_text:
### Boilerplate / Other Tools

*   [FastAPI on Google Cloud Run (⭐199)](https://github.com/anthonycorletti/cloudrun-fastapi) - Boilerplate for API building with FastAPI, SQLModel, and Google Cloud Run.
*   [FastAPI with Firestore (⭐48)](https://github.com/anthonycorletti/firestore-fastapi) - Boilerplate for API building with FastAPI and Google Cloud Firestore.
items.content_html:
Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI on Google Cloud Run (⭐199) - Boilerplate for API building with FastAPI, SQLModel, and Google Cloud Run.
  • FastAPI with Firestore (⭐48) - Boilerplate for API building with FastAPI and Google Cloud Firestore.

items.title: Awesome Iot
items.content_text:
### Software / Operating systems

*   [Android Things](https://developer.android.com/things/) - **Note: Android Things is depreciated.** Android Things extends the Android platform to all your connected devices, so they are easy to set up and work seamlessly with each other and your smartphone.
items.content_html:
Software / Operating systems

  • Android Things - Note: Android Things is depreciated. Android Things extends the Android platform to all your connected devices, so they are easy to set up and work seamlessly with each other and your smartphone.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [vite-vue-proste (⭐17)](https://github.com/xyhxx/vite-vue-proste) - Pinia + Typescript + Vue-Router4 + Vitest + Vue-Test-Utils + Vue-Query + Sass + ESLint + Stylelint + Prettier + `project presets`.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vue 3

  • vite-vue-proste (⭐17) - Pinia + Typescript + Vue-Router4 + Vitest + Vue-Test-Utils + Vue-Query + Sass + ESLint + Stylelint + Prettier + project presets.
